page.title: 13PETS
page.content: {...My Pet Katie.. My guinea pig is ginger,black & white, She lives with Thomas but they do not fight. Her name is Katie & she is very sweet, She is nice & fat 'cause she likes to eat. ........... She lives in a hutch, to the fence it is screwed, Dandelions and pellets are some of her food, She has lots of water in a dish to drink, Katie is the nicest guinea pig ever I think. ........... Children's pets include hamsters,cats, dogs,rabbits,guinea pigs,birds.The favourite pets are those most easily looked after by children such as hamsters and goldfish.
